mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectInfOrdGodErpDstbRepair Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ ORD_NO , ORD_GOD_TURN , QTY_TURN , REPAIR_NO , REPAIR_TP_CD , REPAIR_RECR_NM , REPAIR_RECR_PHON , REPAIR_RCEPT_CHRGER_NM , REPAIR_RCEPT_SHOP_ID , REPAIR_RCEPT_CHRGER_PHON , REPAIR_RCEPT_DT , REPAIR_CNCL_DT , REPAIR_COMPT_YN , REPAIR_COMPT_CD , REPAIR_COMPT_DT , REPAIR_CONT , REPAIR_DLV_SECT_CD , REPAIR_DLV_HDRY_COM_CD , REPAIR_DLV_WAYBIL_NO , CLM_NO , CLM_WRHS_GOD_TURN , BADN_GOD_AFF_COM_CNFIRM_DT , BADN_GOD_CNFIRM_ADMIN_ID , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM INF_ORD_GOD_ERP_DSTB_REPAIR WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORD_NO = #{ordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ORD_GOD_TURN = #{ordGodTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND QTY_TURN = #{qtyTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
